00003 include_once("CMClass.php");

00026 class CMHTML implements CMClass {
00027  
00036  public static function Table($a) {
00037   // convert queries to data, we dont want to convert the 'data' key because it might be
00038   // very large
00039   foreach($a as $k => $v) {
00040    if($a[$k] instanceof CMQueryProtocol && $k != 'data')
00041     $a[$k] = $a[$k]->fetchAll('cell', 'vertical');
00042   }
00043   
00044   // get the table id or create one, we may need this later
00045   $table_id = substr(md5(time()), 0, 8);
00046   if(isset($a['table.id']))
00047    $table_id = $a['table.id'];
00048   
00049   // create the <table> tag
00050   $r = CMHTML::BuildTag('table', 'table.', $a);
00051   
00052   // make sure we have data
00053   if(!isset($a['data']))
00054    $a['data'] = array();
00055   
00056   // find the maximum amount of columns
00057   $cols = 1;
00058   if(is_array($a['data'])) {
00059    foreach($a['data'] as $row) {
00060     if(is_array($row)) {
00061      $count = CMHTML::CountColumns($row);
00062      if($count > $cols)
00063       $cols = $count;
00064     }
00065    }
00066   }
00067   
00068   // generate header (and save for later)
00069   $header = '';
00070   if(isset($a['header'])) {
00071    $header .= CMHTML::BuildTag('tr', 'thead.', $a);
00072    
00073    foreach($a['header'] as $cell)
00074     $header .= CMHTML::BuildTag('th', 'th.', $a) . $cell . '</th>';
00075     
00076    $header .= '</tr>';
00077    $r .= $header;
00078   }
00079   
00080   // a normal data array
00081   if(is_array($a['data'])) {
00082    $rowid = 0;
00083    foreach($a['data'] as $row) {
00084     if(!is_array($row))
00085      $row = array($row);
00086     
00087     // create id
00088     if(isset($a['ids']) && $a['ids'])
00089      $row['tr.id'] = "{$table_id}_tr$rowid";
00090     
00091     $r .= CMHTML::BuildTag('tr', 'tr.', $a, $row, array_merge($row, array('rowid' => $rowid)));
00092     
00093     $i = 0;
00094     foreach($row as $k => $cell) {
00095      // create id
00096      if(isset($a['ids']) && $a['ids'])
00097       $row['td.id'] = "{$table_id}_tr{$rowid}_td$i";
00098      if(CMHTML::CountColumns($row) != $cols)
00099       $row['td.colspan'] = $cols - CMHTML::CountColumns($row) + 1;
00100       
00101      // skip tag attributes
00102      if(substr($k, 0, 3) == 'tr.' || substr($k, 0, 3) == 'td.')
00103       continue;
00104       
00105      // data replacer
00106      if(isset($a["data@$i"])) {
00107       if(is_object($a["data@$i"]))
00108        $cell = $a["data@$i"](array_merge($row, array('rowid' => $rowid, 'colid' => $i)));
00109       else
00110        $cell = $a["data@$i"];
00111      }
00112       
00113      $r .= CMHTML::BuildTag('td', 'td.', $a, $row, array_merge($row, array('rowid' => $rowid, 'colid' => $i))) . $cell . '</td>';
00114      ++$i;
00115     }
00116      
00117     ++$rowid;
00118     $r .= "</tr>";
00119     
00120     // repeat header
00121     if(isset($a['repeatheader']) && !($rowid % $a['repeatheader']))
00122      $r .= $header;
00123    }
00124   }
00125   
00126   // a database query handle
00127   elseif($a['data'] instanceof CMQueryProtocol) {
00128    $rowid = 0;
00129    while($row = $a['data']->fetch()) {
00130     // create id
00131     if(isset($a['ids']) && $a['ids'])
00132      $row['tr.id'] = "{$table_id}_tr$rowid";
00133     
00134     $r .= CMHTML::BuildTag('tr', 'tr.', $a, $row, array_merge($row, array('rowid' => $rowid)));
00135       
00136     $i = 0;
00137     foreach($row as $k => $v) {
00138      // create id and colspan
00139      if(isset($a['ids']) && $a['ids'])
00140       $row['td.id'] = "{$table_id}_tr{$rowid}_td$i";
00141      
00142      // skip tag attributes
00143      if(substr($k, 0, 3) == 'tr.' || substr($k, 0, 3) == 'td.')
00144       continue;
00145       
00146      // data replacer
00147      if(isset($a["data@$i"])) {
00148       if(is_object($a["data@$i"]))
00149        $v = $a["data@$i"](array_merge($row, array('rowid' => $rowid, 'colid' => $i)));
00150       else
00151        $v = $a["data@$i"];
00152      }
00153       
00154      $r .= CMHTML::BuildTag('td', 'td.', $a, $row, array_merge($row, array('rowid' => $rowid, 'colid' => $i))) . $v . '</td>';
00155      ++$i;
00156     }
00157     
00158     ++$rowid;
00159     $r .= "</tr>";
00160     
00161     // repeat header
00162     if(isset($a['repeatheader']) && !($rowid % $a['repeatheader']))
00163      $r .= $header;
00164    }
00165   }
00166   
00167   $r .= "</table>\n";
00168   return $r;
00169  }
00170  
00180  private static function BuildTag($tag, $look, $a, $row = array(), $args = false) {
00181   $r = "<$tag";
00182   $attr = array();
00183   
00184   // create an array with parent and child attributes
00185   foreach($a as $k => $v) {
00186    if(substr($k, 0, strlen($look)) == $look && strpos($k, '@') === false)
00187     $attr[substr($k, strlen($look))] = $v;
00188   }
00189   foreach($row as $k => $v) {
00190    if(substr($k, 0, strlen($look)) == $look && strpos($k, '@') === false)
00191     $attr[substr($k, strlen($look))] = $v;
00192   }
00193   
00194   if(isset($args['colid'])) {
00195    foreach($row as $k => $v) {
00196     $pos = strpos($k, '@');
00197     if($pos !== false && substr($k, $pos + 1) == $args['colid']) {
00198      $pos2 = strpos($k, '.');
00199      $attr[substr($k, $pos2 + 1, $pos - $pos2 - 1)] = $v;
00200     }
00201    }
00202   }
00203   
00204   // create tag
00205   foreach($attr as $k => $v) {
00206    if(is_object($v))
00207     $r .= " $k=\"" . $v($args) . '"';
00208    else
00209     $r .= " $k=\"$v\"";
00210   }
00211   
00212   return "$r>";
00213  }
00214  
00219  private static function CountColumns($row) {
00220   $count = 0;
00221   
00222   if(is_array($row)) {
00223    foreach($row as $k => $v) {
00224     if(is_numeric($k))
00225      ++$count;
00226    }
00227   }
00228   else
00229    $count = 1;
00230    
00231   return $count;
00232  }
00233  
00237  public function __toString() {
00238   return "<" . get_class($this) . ">";
00239  }
00240  
00241 }
